Title: The Act of Succession
Plot: Sir Thomas More refuses to accept Henry's command that his people swear an oath of "allegiance and recognition of the King's supremacy" to both church and state. Anne is made aware of the King's womanizing ways, and arranges then gives her blessing to his next mistress. Also, Anne has a confrontation with Lady Mary, Henry's daughter.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: David Alpay (Mark Smeaton), Padraic Delaney (George Boleyn), Bosco Hogan (Bishop Fisher), Perdita Weeks (Mary Boleyn), Anthony Brophy (Ambassador Chapuys), Catherine Byrne (Alice More), John Kavanagh (Card
